Html:
Hy radioman,

I was wondering, is there a way of getting the route directions also along with the points?

For example:

http://maps.google.at/maps?f=d&source=s_d&saddr=Vienna,+Austria&daddr=Berlin,+Deutschland&hl=de&geocode=%3BFY1xIQMdSKTMAA&mra=ls&sll=50.271795,15.24401&sspn=8.329353,23.269043&ie=UTF8&t=h&z=6

On the left you also get a list of directions that you have to take in order to reach the destination. Is this possible?

Great tool by the way :)

Cristian.

 

EDIT: Damn! Double question, just saw the same discussion 5-7 places down. Sorry about that.
yeah, ...there is autogenerted kml serialize/deserialize class, but it currently not working... maybe i'll switch to manual parsing... it's definitely possible, just question of implementation ;}
